resources.string: Anything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.
The task always takes longer than expected to complete, even if you have considered Hofstader\'s Law.
Kernel with excellent optimization and balance of performance to autonomy.
List of useful modules for all occasions.
Welcome to Craft Rom, you need root access for all functions to work properly!
